title: If this isn't the most obvious use of ELO boosting I don't know what is....
body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=geoffreygx

Riot, please put this account under investigation

replies.body: Looks suspicious but might need more evidence. He might have picked up that champ from practising on his smurf (or people dont know how to counter her). If he/she however stops playing eve entirely afterwards then the account is almost 99% eloboosted.
Got to Plat 5 and stopped playing Eve and started losing games. Not suss at all haha :D I dunno, I guess at the end of the day it's pretty sad if someone pays to get their account boosted

eve is quite strong. you never know but he could have been on a smurf or anything. u have no proof. so what if a person starts playing a champion. i started playing irelia like 5 days ago and have 1 88% win ratio as her.
Played ranked all the way up to Plat 5, stopped playing eve once that happened and then started losing games? Yeah, looks pretty suss to me

I'm going to do everything that I possibly can do to get this account banned. 3 days ago this guy just randomly decides to start playing Eve and has an 82% win rate? Yeah I doubt it. I look forward to the look on this guys face once he gets permabanned

You can't ban me faggot :P

I paid for my boost fair and square, they used VPN and everything so Riot don't know it wasn't me!

Why do you care?
The guys winrate and scores were already good before the eve games. Doesn't seem that unlikely that he could pick up eve and stomp
